original_solution_mapping.L1: 50cm³ will make one balloon touch the ceiling so 1800cm³ will make 1800/50 = <<1800/50=36>>36 balloons touch the ceiling
original_solution_mapping.L2: There are 50 balloons in total so 50-36 = <<50-36=14>>14 balloons will not float since they were filled with ordinary air
original_solution_mapping.L3: There are 36-14 = <<36-14=22>>22 more balloons touching the ceiling than not

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2524.
    Returns: the difference between balloons touching the ceiling and not.
    """
    # L1
    helium_per_balloon = 50 # One balloon needs 50cm³ to float
    total_helium_volume = 1800 # 1800cm³ of helium
    balloons_touching_ceiling = total_helium_volume / helium_per_balloon

    # L2
    total_balloons = 50 # bought 50 balloons
    balloons_not_floating = total_balloons - balloons_touching_ceiling

    # L3
    difference_floating_not_floating = balloons_touching_ceiling - balloons_not_floating

    # FA
    answer = difference_floating_not_floating
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: {helium_per_balloon}cm³ will make one balloon touch the ceiling so {total_helium_volume}cm³ will make {total_helium_volume}/{helium_per_balloon} = <<{total_helium_volume}/{helium_per_balloon}={balloons_touching_ceiling}>>{balloons_touching_ceiling} balloons touch the ceiling

There are {total_balloons} balloons in total so {total_balloons}-{balloons_touching_ceiling} = <<{total_balloons}-{balloons_touching_ceiling}={balloons_not_floating}>>{balloons_not_floating} balloons will not float since they were filled with ordinary air

There are {balloons_touching_ceiling}-{balloons_not_floating} = <<{balloons_touching_ceiling}-{balloons_not_floating}={difference_floating_not_floating}>>{difference_floating_not_floating} more balloons touching the ceiling than not

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: 50cm³ will make one balloon touch the ceiling so 1800cm³ will make 1800/50 = <<1800/50=36>>36 balloons touch the ceiling
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: There are 50 balloons in total so 50-36 = <<50-36=14>>14 balloons will not float since they were filled with ordinary air
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: There are 50-14 = <<50-14=36>>36 more balloons touching the ceiling than not

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_balloons' (value: 50) was used instead of 'balloons_touching_ceiling' (value: 36.0).
